1.name: Abomination
1.description: This Tanky mass of flesh and steel will Hook ranged enemies, drawing them into his Cleave attack.
talents: Noxius Presence: Poison nearby enemies every 3 seconds.
Cannonball: On deploy and at 50 % health, stun nearby enemies for 5 seconds.
Fresh Meat: After hooking a target, deal double damage on the next attack.

2.name: Angry Chickens
2.description: A flock of feathered fowl that can overwhelm even the heartiest of Tanks and Towers.
talents: Snackrifice: Nearby Beast allies can consume a Chicken to heal themselves.
Walking Crate: Deploy in a protective crate. When destroyed, Chickens emerge.
Furious Fowl: Gain Fury.

3.name: Arcane Blast
3.description: This spell surges with power! Each extra tap increases Gold cost by 1 and doubles the Elemental damage!
talents: Amplification: Sequential taps increase radius by 1.
Arcane Power: Spell sequence starts at rank 3 and ends at rank 4.
Torrent: Gain a level after casting Rank 4.

4.name: Banshee
4.description: Shrieks in delight at nearby enemies, Possessing the first she sees to fight for you, permanently.
talents: Soul Eruption: Possessed targets detonate on death, damaging nearby enemies.
Unholy Frenzy: Possessed targets gain Bloodlust for 10 seconds.
Will of the Necropolis: Fully Heal the possessed target.

5.name: Baron Rivendare
talents: Death Pact: Periodically sacrifice a nearby Skeleton to be Healed.
Skeletal Frenzy: Nearby allied Skeletons gain Bloodlust.
Chill Of The Grave: Summon Skeletal Mages instead of Warriors.

6.name: Bat Rider
6.description: A cheap aerial unit that specializes in bathing the ground in flame while Flying above Melee enemies.
talents: Flaming Pitch: Flaming pool reduces enemy's speed by 30%.
Enchanted Vials: Increase the size of the flaming pool by 30%.
Fiery Surplus: "Accidentally" leave vials on the ground, Burning nearby enemies that touch them.

7.name: Blizzard
7.description: Rain down Frost shards from the sky! Slows and deals Elemental damage to all enemies in a large area.
talents: Cold Snap: Freeze enemy troops in place.
Brittle Ice: Enemies within take 30% additional damage from Physical sources.
Icecrown: Summons an additional Blizzard at your Base.

8.name: Bloodmage Thalnos
8.description: Blood magic is thicker than water magic.
talents: Drain Life: Gain Lifesteal.
Bane: Playing a spell increases attack speed by 30% for 5 seconds.
Dominance: Spells costing 4 or more grant an additional level.

9.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
talents: Reincarnation: After death, Resurrect at 50% Health once.
Plainsrunning: Move 50% faster and gain the Fast trait.
Aftershock: When Stun expires, affected enemies are Dazed for 5 seconds.

10.name: Chain Lightning
10.description: Swarmed by Squads of smaller foes? Send a surge of lightning sizzling through several enemies!
talents: Brilliant Flash: On deploy, Stun enemies within for 1 second.
Reverberation: Can be cast a second time.
Storm's Reach: Dramatically increase jump distance between targets.

11.name: Charlga Razorflank
11.description: Your Minis in hand share the same cost. What???
talents: Spirit Passage: Minis played for 5 Gold gain a level and deploy in Stealth.
Cavernous Mists: Deploy cost reduced by 1.
Nature's Grasp: Root two additional nearby targets, but deal half damage.

12.name: Cheat Death
12.description: Imbue your minions with one last breath of death, preventing them from dying for a precious few seconds.
talents: Vampirism: Affected minis are Healed when dealing damage.
Apocalypse: Affected Skeletons Resurrect at your base when they die.
Seal Fate: Affected minis gain Bloodlust, but die when the effect ends.

13.name: Core Hounds
13.description: This pair of Resistant Tanks is only dead when both are snuffed out. When one falls, the other rekindles it!
talents: Eternal Bond: Resurrection range is unlimited.
Guard Dog: Deal 50% additional damage near friendly towers and meeting stones.
Fiery Rebirth: On Resurrection, damage nearby enemies.

14.name: Dark Iron Miner
14.description: When there's more Gold than your Kobold can mine, hire another to mine behind enemy lines!
talents: Gold Mine: After Mining, drop a proximity mine. Damages nearby enemies when touched.
Dark Iron Armaments: After Mining, gain Armored.
Dwarven Ambition: Gain Fury.

15.name: Darkspear Troll
15.description: This headhunter deals massive damage with savage spear throws. Enemies in the air beware!
talents: Big Bad Voodoo: Regenerate 20% health every second.
Headhunting: On kill, increase Attack and Movement speed by 10%. Stacks to 50%.
Serpent Sting: Gain Poison.

16.name: Deep Breath
16.description: Strike with dragon's breath in any direction, dealing Elemental damage to enemies in the line of fire!
talents: Attunement: Allies caught in the effect gain Resist.
Melting Point: Damaging Armored enemies removes their Armor.
Double Dragon: Cast a second wave in the opposite direction.

17.name: Defias Bandits
17.description: Stealthy and weak on their own, but will sneak up and Stun enemies while your damage dealers open fire!
talents: Pick Lock: Earn an extra +2 Gold when opening chests.
Deadly Poison: Gain Poison.
Last Resort: On death, Stun the target for 3 seconds.

18.name: Drake
18.description: Flies over the battlefield with flaming breath, incinerating Flying and Ground enemies alike.
talents: Mother Drake: Periodically summon a Whelp Egg.
Engulfing Flames: Damaging enemies Burns them.
Roost: Perch on top of a nearby tower, staying there to defend it.

19.name: Earth Elemental
19.description: Drop this heavily Armored avalanche anywhere to Tank for your troops. Only punches Towers and Bosses.
talents: Obsidian Shard: On death, split into two smaller Earth Elementals.
Ready to Rumble: Taunt on deploy.
Shrapnel Blast: Destroying a tower deals damage to nearby enemies.

20.name: Execute
20.description: Savagely slice through enemies, chopping off half of their maximum Health in one swipe.
talents: Bloodthirsty: Bloodlust allies within spell area for 10 seconds.
Overpower: Knock enemies away from the cast location.
Killing Spree: If an enemy is killed, the next Horde mini costs 1 less.

21.name: Fire Elemental
21.description: Resistant to Elemental damage. Specializes in Cleaving through Armored enemies.
talents: Immolation Aura: Periodically damage nearby enemies.
Molten Core: On death, summon a pool of lava, damaging enemies within.
Fan The Flames: Taking Elemental damage increases damage dealt by 10%. Stacks to 30%.

22.name: Firehammer
22.description: Furiously flings fiery hammers at foes. Starts slow, but her Armor melting momentum can't be matched.
talents: Moultin' Metal: Deal 50% more damage to Flying enemies.
Blazing Speed: Fury builds up to 40% higher.
Heightened Rage: Level up upon reaching full Fury.

23.name: Flamewaker
23.description: Ignites the ground with waves of flame, incinerating supporting troops behind enemy Tanks.
talents: Backdraft: Successive attacks increase flame wave distance. Resets on movement.
Engulf: Damaging enemies Burns thems.
Heat Stroke: Damaging enemies Dazes them.

24.name: Footmen
24.description: An Armored phalanx Squad of steel, a great Tank for fragile allies, and can be split to defend two lanes at once!
talents: Fortification: Gain 30% extra empty Health.
Shield Bash: Periodically Stun the target for 1 second.
Last Stand: Armor increases to 75% damage reduction when no other Footmen are nearby.

25.name: Frostwolf Shaman
25.description: Why choose between Ranged damage and Healing when you can have both? Elemental mastery to heal and harm!
talents: Earth Shield: Grant Armored to a nearby ally. Ability has 1 charge.
Lightning Mastery: Ranged attack chains to 3 nearby targets.
Earthwall Totem: Once per deploy, place a totem that partially heals a nearby tower or base.

26.name: Gargoyle
26.description: A Flying fortress of Armor. This single-minded Tank attacks buildings and bosses, ignoring all other distractions.
talents: Wing Buffet: ncreases move speed by 33%.
Aerial Superiority: Incoming damage from Flying minis is reduced by 50%.
Obsidian Statue: On death, summon a statue with Taunt. Lasts until destroyed.

27.name: General Drakkisath
talents: Chromatic Scales: Grants nearby allies the Resistant trait.
Piercing Blows: Attacks pierce through enemies in a line.
Lasting Legacy: On death, drop a banner. Nearby enemies take 50% additional Elemental damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

28.name: Ghoul
28.description: A cheap but ravenous Tank, ready to feast on fallen enemies to replenish its Health.
talents: Bone Shield: Cannibalizing grants Armored for 10 seconds.
Taste for Blood: Deal 50% additional damage to enemies who are below 50% health.
Ravenous: Cannibalizing grants Bloodlust for 10 seconds.

29.name: Gnoll Brute
29.description: A tough Tank with a menacing mace. Cleaves through Squads of enemies, or clobbers with collateral damage.
talents: Rabid: Reduce deploy cost by 1 and gain the Cycle trait.
Pillage: Deal Siege damage.
Thick Hide: Gain Armor.

30.name: Goblin Sapper
30.description: Sappers sacrifice themselves to deliver superior Siege damage in seconds. Topple Towers with this tag team!
talents: Rocket Powered Turbo Boots: Move twice as fast and gain the Fast trait.
Extra BOOM: Deploy an additional +1 Goblin Sapper.
Crude Gunpowder: On death, Burn nearby enemies.

31.name: Grommash Hellscream
talents: Bladestorm: Gain an AOE bladespin ability that damages all nearby enemies.
Savage Strikes: Deal double damage to enemies who are below 50% health.
Mirror Image: Summon two fragile mirror images when entering combat.

32.name: Gryphon Rider
32.description: A sky-riding Flier that throws mighty dwarven hammers at aerial and ground troops alike.
talents: Mighty Throw: Gain +3 Range.
Odyn's Fury: Gain Fury.
Air Drop: Periodically drop a potion, leveling up the first ally to touch it.

33.name: Harpies
33.description: A trio of fragile Fliers, but if they can reach their target, they will shred it in seconds.
talents: Infectious Swipes: Gain Poison.
Trinket Collectors: Gain the Miner trait. Cost increased by 1.
Talon Dive: Deal double damage on the 1st attack.

34.name: Harvest Golem
34.description: A hearty Melee automaton with a trick up its sleeve - After its first death it will shock itself back to life!
talents: Trojan Chickens: On death, spawn 4 Angry Chickens.
Unstable Core: On death, Stun nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
Bountiful Harvest: On death, apply a Heal over time effect to nearby allies.

35.name: Hogger
35.description: The legendary terror of Elwynn Forest. Mercilessly CLEAVES aspiring adventurers and rallies Gnoll Brutes to his cause.
talents: Ham Hock: Hogger also gains +10% max health each time he is played.
Spoiled Meat: Gain Poison.
Fatal Frenzy: On death, Bloodlust nearby Beasts.

36.name: Holy Nova
36.description: Bathe friend and foe in holy light, Healing allies and damaging enemies to turn the tide of battle!
talents: Inner Fire: Affected allies gain Armored and Resist for 5 seconds.
Amplify Magic: Effects are doubled on all Elemental minis.
Renew: Also adds a heal over time to allies.

37.name: Huntress
37.description: A Fast and lethal Ranged rider. Her glaives slice through Squads, bouncing from foe to foe.
talents: Elven Might: Deal 50% additional damage to the initial target.
Shadowmeld: Gain Stealth and Ambush.
Darnassian Steel: Glaive bounces an additional 3 times.

38.name: Jaina Proudmoore
talents: Clearcasting: Spells cost 1 less (but no less than 1) if played immediately after Jaina.
Flurry: Frostbolts burst on impact, Frosting enemies near the target.
Blink: Periodically teleport away from attackers.

39.name: Living Bomb
39.description: Plant a bomb on a group of enemies that all blow up for excessive collateral damage. The more the flamier!
talents: Chain Reaction: Splash damage inflicts Living Bomb.
Blast Radius: Also burn enemies within 10 units.
Burden Of Fate: Affected enemies are Dazed.

40.name: Maiev Shadowsong
40.description: Wield the shadows and strike like the wind.
talents: Remorseless: Deal double damage for 2 seconds after killing an enemy.
Enveloping Shadows: Cast Smoke Bomb on deploy, Stealthing nearby allies.
Shadowstep: eriodically teleport to a ranged attacker when hit.

41.name: Meat Wagon
41.description: Sieges enemies with slabs of meat. Bombards from so far away that it outranges Towers!
talents: Filet Trebuchet: Increase Bombard range by +2.
Meat And Bones: Every other attack summons a Skeleton instead of dealing damage.
Greased Gears: Gain Fury.

42.name: Molten Giant
42.description: A wall of Armored obsidian. Slow and lumbering but devastating to Towers. The ultimate Melee Tank.
talents: Bolster: Heal when destroying a tower.
Threatening Presence: Gain Taunt.
Blood Of The Mountain: On death, explode, damaging nearby enemies.

43.name: Mountaineer
43.description: This inseparable Tank and Ranged pair cover each other for an instantly effective offensive!
talents: Mend Pets: Heal up to 3 additional nearby Beasts when healing the Bear.
Intimidation: Bear gains Taunt.
Frenzied Spirit: When the Bear or Mountaineer die, the other gains Bloodlust.

44.name: Murloc Tidehunters
44.description: Fast and cheap, great for supporting Tanks and taking Treasure Chests, but weak on their own.
talents: Safety Bubble: Deploy with a bubble that blocks the first attack.
Morelocs: Deploy with +1 additional Murloc.
Careful Aim: Gain +2 range.

45.name: Necromancer
45.description: Endlessly summons Skeletons for protection while piercing through Armor with Elemental shadow bolts.
talents: Jeweled Skulls: Summon Skeletal Mages instead of Skeletons.
Cult of the Damned: On kill, summon a Skeleton.
Breath of the Dying: On death, summon 5 Skeletons.

46.name: Ogre Mage
46.description: Hurling fireballs is always brutal, but this Magi also buffs nearby allies with Bloodlust. More bang for your buck!
talents: Avarice: Gain Bloodlust when Bloodlusting an ally.
Frostfire Bolt: Gain Frost.
Ignite: Burn enemy targets.

47.name: Old Murk-Eye
47.description: This seasoned Murloc has (and hasn't) seen plenty of battles. If you can shell out the Gold, his entourage of Tidehunters is shore to make waves on the battlefield.
talents: Marathon Of The Murlocs: March of the Murlocs lasts an additional 5 seconds longer after deploying.
Electric Eels: Attacks briefly Stun enemies.
Tip of the Spear: Tidehunters spawn at Old Murk Eye's location instead.

48.name: Plague Farmer
48.description: Bombards enemy ground troops with Poisonous pumpkins. Keep him alive and watch enemies rot!
talents: Splashing Pumpkins: Increase Range by +1 and double the Splash area.
Parting Gift: On death, summon a pumpkin. When touched, it Poisons nearby enemies.
Virulence: On kill, Poison enemies near the target.

49.name: Polymorph
49.description: Morphs your foes into fluffy yet feeble sheep, stripping them of their defenses and making them Vulnerable for a precious few seconds!
talents: Golden Fleece: One sheep becomes golden. Killing it grants +1 gold.
Exploding Sheep: Killing a sheep damages nearby enemies.
Stable Transfiguration: Lasts twice as long, but sheep regenerate health very quickly.

50.name: Prowler
50.description: A Fast and ferocious Melee Tank. Sprints ahead to protect slower troops, or defend a far away fight.
talents: On The Prowl: Gain Stealth, and stun the target when attacking from Stealth.
Pack Leader: Grants nearby Beast allies 30% additional damage.
Predatory Instincts: Deal double damage to enemies who are at more than 75% health.

51.name: Pyromancer
51.description: Sometimes you need to light an enemy on fire. She prefers to light them all on fire.
talents: Conflagrate: Splash area is doubled.
Pyroblast: Deal triple damage on the first attack.
Blaze of Glory: Damage and Burn nearby enemies on death.

52.name: Quilboar
52.description: Surprise your enemies with this Unbound Melee burrower! Slow to emerge but bristling for a fight.
talents: Tunnel Vision: Deploy much more quickly.
Bristleback: Deal a small amount of damage to Melee attackers.
Bramble Burst: Inflict Poison on nearby enemies when emerging.

53.name: Raptors
53.description: Fast savage slashers! Each extra tap increases Gold cost by 1 and deploys an additional Raptor.
talents: Strength In Numbers: Deal 10% more damage for each other Raptor nearby.
Fast Food: On kill, heal a small amount of damage.
Motivation: Gain Bloodlust while a chest or gold vein is nearby.

54.name: Rend Blackhand
54.description: Riding dragons before it was coool.
talents: Scale and Steel: Gain Resistant while flying and Armored while dismounted.
Flaming Soul: Cast Living Bomb upon dismounting, damaging nearby enemies.
Legionnaire: Dismount when first taking damage. The Drake continues fighting.

55.name: S.A.F.E. Pilot
55.description: A flexible Ranged unit. Crash her into enemies or land her behind your Tanks for Area Damage support.
talents: Gnomish Cloaking Device: Deploy from the explosion with Stealth and Ambush.
Comin' In Hot!: Deploy twice as fast and Burn nearby enemies.
Gnomish Muttonizer: Polymorph the first blaster target.

56.name: Skeleton Party
56.description: A Frosty surprise for any location! Raise a Squad of Ranged and Melee Skeletons to assist with any skirmish.
talents: 5-Man: Summons a Skeleton Tank, Rogue, Priest, and 2 Mages.
Corpse Run: Gain +1 level for each deploy after the first. (Maximum +3 levels)
Ritual of Rime: Summon 5 Skeleton Mages who guard the deploy location.

57.name: Skeletons
57.description: These Skeletons can arise anywhere on the map to distract enemies or claim a remote resource.
talents: Questing Buddies: One Skeleton gains Armor, one gains Resist, and one gains Stealth.
Exhume: If deployed near a Tower or Meeting Stone, deploy +2 additional Skeletons.
Cackle: Gain Taunt.

58.name: Smoke Bomb
58.description: Get the drop on your enemies by granting Stealth to nearby allies. Use in a skirmish to confuse the enemy!
talents: Through The Shadows: Affected minis move 50% faster until unstealthed.
Band Of Thieves: Grant +2 levels to Cycle minis within.
Strangers in the Night: Effects apply to enemies as well.

59.name: Sneed
59.description: When you are a buzzsaw, all your problems look like trees.
talents: Lead With Greed: Gain an additional +2 Gold when Sneed triggers Sneed Before Greed.
Mine Is Money, Friend!: Gain the Miner trait.
Land Grab: Gain a level whenever Sneed Before Greed.

60.name: Spiderlings
60.description: A Squad of Poisonous predators. Their venom will pierce Armor and down even the mightiest of Tanks.
talents: Frostbite: Gain Frost.
Bloated Carapace: Explode on death, Poisoning nearby enemies.
Envenom: Deal twice as much Poison damage.

61.name: Stonehoof Tauren
61.description: An exceptionally beefy bruiser that will Charge into battle, and even Charge while she's in battle!
talents: Momentum: After connecting a charge, immediately charge a second time if possible.
Pummel: After connecting a charge, Stun the target for 3 seconds.
Provoke: After connecting a charge, Taunt nearby enemies.

62.name: Sylvannas Windrunner
62.description: Sylvanas attacks with unrelenting arrow shots, and releases a Banshee when she dies.
talents: Black Arrow: Pierce through enemies in a line, dealing Elemental damage.
Banshee's Wail: Scream on Death, Stunning nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
Forsaken Fury: Nearby Horde and Undead Minis gain Fury.

63.name: Tirion Fordring
63.description: A hammer of CLEAVING , a hand of HEALING , and ARMOR of believing. What more do you need?
talents: Divine Shield: Gain a magical shield at 30% health, absorbing all damage for 5 seconds.
By The Light: Heal the primary target for twice as much.
Consecrate: Regularly consecrate the ground, damaging enemies within.

64.name: Vultures
64.description: A cheap pair of Flying scavengers. Two vultures are a nuisance, but each vulture victim adds to the flock!
talents: Feeding Frenzy: The flock gains Bloodlust for 5 seconds when spawning a new Vulture.
Migration: All additional Vultures spawn at your base.
Tendon Rip: Attacks Daze enemies for 3 seconds.

65.name: Warsong Grunts
65.description: While slow and steady at the start, this Squad of fighters will speed up, Furiously slashing at frightened foes.
talents: Command: Nearby Beast allies deal 30% additional damage.
Blood Pact: When a Grunt dies, the other gain Bloodlust.
Guard Duty: Remain at deploy location until entering combat.

66.name: Warsong Raider
66.description: This Fast rider smashes Towers with savage sustained Siege damage. Clear a path and she'll clear the rest.
talents: Razing Focus: Become a Siege unit, ignoring enemy Minis.
Sunder Armor: Damaging an Armored enemy removes their Armor.
Saboteur: Damaging a tower reduces its damage dealt by 50% for 3 seconds.

67.name: Whelp Eggs
67.description: Drop these eggs anywhere on the battlefield to surprise Melee enemies with many fiery Flying whelps!
talents: Flame Burst: Damage nearby enemies when hatching.
Rookery: When one egg hatches, the others hatch immediately.
Chromatic Plating: Eggs gain Taunt.

68.name: Worgen
68.description: This Stealthy predator assassinates annoying Ranged units. Play him anywhere and tear their support apart!
talents: Premeditation: Increase Ambush damage by 50%.
Lone Wolf: On deploy, grant +1 gold if no allies are nearby.
Frenzy: On kill, gain Bloodlust for 10 seconds.

69.name: Chimaera
69.description: A Flying malefic monstrosity that rains down Poison and Lightning on multiple miniscule minions.
talents: Leviathan: Gain 10% additional Health per deploy.
Frost Shock: Lightning Ball applies Frost on hit.
Fiery Rebirth: Poison Spit inflicts twice as much Poison.

70.name: Emperor Thaurissan
70.description: If Ragnaros was your boss, you'd be cranky too.
talents: Moira's Wit: Nearby Burning enemies Heal Thaurissan.
Hubris: After playing Thaurissan, your next non-Elemental Mini deploys with +2 levels.
Incinerate: Lava Spike's Burn is permanent.
